archimate:Requirement.name: PA.2.3.7a: a) integrating mobile apps into IT and security operations (e.g. by deploying apps in a planned manner and providing operational support consistent with other IT and security operations)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
